transcript: I don't know. Well, I wouldn't mind living by a USE campus, you know, but I'm not gonna go to school right now, so...

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I don't know.  Well.  I wouldn't mind living by the U.S.C. campus, you know, but I'm not going to go to school right now, so.
